attributes.action: stop cuts by southeastern to our train service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Southeastern trains' timetable from 13 December 2009 shows a large reduction in peak time trains in the morning rush hour to Cannon Street and Charing Cross from Blackheath. Further no trains from the Woolwich branch to Blackheath and Lewisham will run between 8am and 9 am.  Considerable service alterations will happen throughout the day. 

We think there has been insufficient consultation and want the service reductions stopped.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " stop cuts by southeastern to our train service."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22509


Prime Minister's Office
